bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington vs. Gus Bendjus et al.

This cause coming on to be heard on this 15 day of October, before Hon. Frank Allyn, Judge of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory for the application of defendants for release from confinement in the county jail in Thurston county , Washington Territory, and the court having heard the arguments of counsel for both partities here to, and being fully adjourned in the presmises , it is hereby

Ordered that said application fo said defendants to be released is hereby refused and said defendants Gus Bendjus, Robert Strauglaud, Alex Agnew, and Thomas Jacobs are hereby now awarded to the custody of the Sheriff of Chehalis conty to be confined at Olympia, Thurston county, Washington Territory, for safe-keeping until they can be tried at Montesano, Chehalis County, unless before that time released by bond or due process of law. All of which defts by their attor. demands exception of which exception to attend.
div1.ab: Frank Allyn Judge of said District
